title: Missing Pepper Case
description:
Description :
        Seo Yechan, the guy who moved in next door, is a s** addict who can't live without having s** at least once a day. Ko Seokjun, his neighbor, suffers from hearing the noises of Yechan's promiscuity every night, and becomes unable to get an erection anymore. Finally, in a moment of desperation, Ko Seokjun prays to G** to get rid of Seo Yechan's di**. Strangely, from that day forward, Seokjun stops hearing moaning from nextdoor, and Yechan tells him the shocking news that his di** is missing."This is definitely my fault, so I need to help fix it, but it's pis**** me off that this guy just sees me as a source of se***."A chaotic romance between the man who wanted to get rid of the other's di**' and the man who needs to get it back'!+
